DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: LO FARO, M.;Lo Faro, M.;Lo Faro, Massimiliano;Faro, Massimiliano Lo;Faro, M. Lo;LOFARO, M;LO'FARO, MASSIMILIANO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Titulo de Doutor em Materiais para o Meio Ambiente e Energia conseguito na Universidade de TorVergata, Roma. At hoje, ele um pesquisador permanente do Conselho Nacional Italiano de Pesquisa (CNR-ITAE) e foi credenciado como professor de cincia de materiais e fundamentos em cincias qumicas. Ele tem 15 anos de experincia no campo da eletroqumica. Em particular, a pesquisa dele refere-se a o desenvolvimento clulas de alta temperatura, incluindo clulas de combustvel, eletrlise e baterias. Alguns resumos de experincia, realizaes e fatos so relatados abaixo: https://sites.google.com/site/lofaromassimiliano/home https://scholar.google.it/citations?user=DWNEJJIAAAAJ&hl=it https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?authorId=23968012500
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: PhD in Materials for Environmental and Energy from the U. of TorVergata, Rome. To date he is Permanent Researcher of the Italian National Council of Research - Institute for Advanced Energy Technologies (CNR-ITAE) and got habilitations to be professor for Material Science technologies and Fundamentals in Chemical Sciences. He is 15 years years experienced researcher in the field of electrochemistry. In particular, his research acitivity concerns with high temperature cells, including fuel cells, electrolysers, and batteriess. Few resumes of experience, achievemts and facts are reported below: https://sites.google.com/site/lofaromassimiliano/home https://scholar.google.it/citations?user=DWNEJJIAAAAJ&hl=it https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?authorId=23968012500

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: -since 2009 up to now: cycle of seminaries entitled ?Tecnologie energetiche a basso impatto ambientale? in a University level course for Environmental and Territory Engineers, U. of Reggio Calabria -April 2011: speech entitled ?Current SOFC R&D activities at CNR-ITAE? in the 15 Energethica Congress. -February 2011: classes of ?Fonti energetiche rinnovabili? in a II level specializing Master Environmental engineers, U. of Reggio Calabria -December 2009: 2 seminaries entitled ?Recent status and research trend in solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature? as invited speaker from Consejo Nacional de Ciencia y Tecnologia (CONACYT), Mexico; -April 2009 : classes of ?elementi di fisica e chimica? in a course for ?formazione per esperto in tecnologie energetiche innovative e loro applicazioni industriali? -November 2007: course for "tecnico superiore per l?automazione industriale?, entitled "Sistemi e tecnologie per la produzione e l?accumulo di idrogeno " He took part in several national projects such as: -MIUR FISR I entitled ?Sviluppo di SOFC planari con elettrodo supportante ad elevata area geometrica? Decreto 16.10.2000 G.U. n. 278 28.11.2000, from 01 September 2003 to 30 September 2005 -Private project contract between EUROCOATING and CNR-ITAE entitled ?Caratterizzazione elettrochimica di celle SOFC? from 1 October 2004 to 30 May 2006 -MIUR FISR II entitled ?Celle a combustibile ad elettroliti polimerici e ceramici: dimostrazione di sistemi e sviluppo di nuovi materiali? from 01 September 2005 to 30 September 2011 -FIRB (MIUR, ministero dell?Istruzione, dell?Universit e della Ricerca) ? RINNOVA and CNR-ITAE entitled ?Tecnologie elettrochimiche innovative per l?accumulo di energia finalizzate all?integrazione con sistemi rinnovabili per la produzione di energia distribuita? from July 2007 up to now -MAP from March 2006 up to now -Private project contract between SOFCPOWER and CNR-ITAE from November 2009 to May 2011
